metadata.title: CVE-2019-14818 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in all dpdk version 17.x.x before 17.11.8, 16.x.x before 16.11.10, 18.x.x before 18.11.4 and 19.x.x before 19.08.1 where a malicious master, or a container with access to vhost_user socket, can send specially crafted VRING_SET_NUM messages, resulting in a memory leak including file descriptors. This flaw could lead to a denial of service condition.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-14818` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dpdk - 18.11.4-1
librte-acl21 - 18.11.4-1
librte-baseband-acc100-21 - 18.11.4-1
librte-baseband-fpga-5gnr-fec21 - 18.11.4-1
